citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Following the facility’s last semi-annual review of its animal care and use program and animal facility inspection on
09/21/2023, the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) failed to prepare and submit a report to the
Institutional Official (IO) as required. Reports completed by the IACUC ensures the Institutional Official is informed and up
to date regarding the current status of the animal program, facilities, and procedures. The IACUC must prepare reports of
its evaluations and submit them to the IO of the research facility. The reports shall be reviewed and signed by a majority
of the IACUC members and must include any minority views.
Correct from this date 01/30/2024 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
Following the facility’s last semi-annual review of its animal care and use program and animal facility inspection on 
09/21/2023, the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) failed to prepare and submit a report to the 
Institutional Official (IO) as required. Reports completed by the IACUC ensures the Institutional Official is informed and up 
to date regarding the current status of the animal program, facilities, and procedures. The IACUC must prepare reports of 
its evaluations and submit them to the IO of the research facility. The reports shall be reviewed and signed by a majority 
of the IACUC members and must include any minority views. 
 
Correct from this date 01/30/2024 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
